Sample:
7E | flag | 
A0 1E | 4 bit + 1 bit + 11 bit | = 1010 + 0 + 000_00011110 (30 bytes)
21 | Destination Address |
03 | Source Address |
73 | Frame type UA |
C3 7A | HSC (Header Check)
81 80 12 | Format identifier, Group identifier and group length |
05 01 80 | parameter identifier, length, value Transmitted |
06 01 80 | parameter identifier, length, value recieved |
07 04 00 00 00 01 | parameter identifier, length, value – window size transmit |
08 04 00 00 00 01 | identifier/length/value – window size receive
53 3B | Frame Check sequence |
7E

7E | flag | 
A0 19 | 4 bit + 1 bit + 11 bit | = 1010 + 0 + 000_00011001 (25)
03 | Destination Address |
21 | Source Address |
32 | Frame type |
6F D8 | HSC - Header Check sequence |
E6 E6 00 | Format identifier, group identifier, group length |
C0 01 | Get Request Normal - C0(Hex) = 192 (Dec) 01(Hex) = 1 (Dec)
C1 | invoke id & Priority |
00 08 | interface class. 08 = Clock |
00 00 01 00 00 FF | logical name, OBIS code of the clock | =0.0.1.0.0.255
02 00 | asking for 2ed attribute, logical name (date & time) |
60 1A | Frame Check sequence |
7E

7E | flag |
A0 1E | 4 bit + 1 bit + 11 bit | = 1010 + 0 + 000_00011110 (30 bytes)
21 | Destination Address |
03 | Source Address |
30 | Frame type |
5C 0A 
E6 E7 00 
C4 01 
C1 
00 
09 0C | Octet string |
07 E1 | Year | = 07E1 = 2017
03 | Month | = 0x03 = 03 = Mars
1A | Day | = 0x1A = 26
07 | day of week | Sunday
0F 3B 33 | Time i 24 base | = 0x0f= 15:, 0x3B= 59:, 0x33= 51 = 15:59:51 
00 | status ok? |
FF | hundre deler ikke spesifisert | 
FF | tusen deler ikke spesifisert | 
00 | status ok |
76 1A | Frame Check |
7E

00 7e 
7e 
a1 0b 41 08 83 13 fa 7c e6 e7 00 0f 40 00 00 00 00 01 0c 02 02 09 06 01 01 00 02 81 ff
